questions.question: I need to ___ my homework before dinner.
questions.example: I need to finish up my homework before dinner.

questions.question: Can you ___ the volume? It's too loud.
questions.example: Can you turn down the volume? It's too loud.

questions.question: I ___ my keys everywhere but I can't find them.
questions.example: I looked for my keys everywhere but I can't find them.

questions.question: She decided to ___ smoking for her health.
questions.example: She decided to give up smoking for her health.

questions.question: The meeting was ___ until next week.
questions.example: The meeting was put off until next week.

questions.question: I need to ___ this word in the dictionary.
questions.example: I need to look up this word in the dictionary.

questions.question: Please ___ your shoes before entering the house.
questions.example: Please take off your shoes before entering the house.

questions.question: I ___ at 6 AM every morning.
questions.example: I wake up at 6 AM every morning.

questions.question: The plane will ___ in ten minutes.
questions.example: The plane will take off in ten minutes.

questions.question: Can you ___ the children while I'm at work?
questions.example: Can you look after the children while I'm at work?

questions.question: I ___ my old friend at the grocery store.
questions.example: I ran into my old friend at the grocery store.

questions.question: They ___ the whole building last month.
questions.example: They tore down the whole building last month.

questions.question: I need to ___ some money for my vacation.
questions.example: I need to save up some money for my vacation.

questions.question: Please ___ the TV. I want to watch the news.
questions.example: Please turn on the TV. I want to watch the news.

questions.question: The car ___ of gas on the highway.
questions.example: The car ran out of gas on the highway.

questions.question: I ___ early this morning to go jogging.
questions.example: I got up early this morning to go jogging.

questions.question: She ___ her jacket because it was cold.
questions.example: She put on her jacket because it was cold.

questions.question: The teacher asked us to ___ our papers.
questions.example: The teacher asked us to hand in our papers.

questions.question: I ___ my old photos last weekend.
questions.example: I looked through my old photos last weekend.

questions.question: The company will ___ 50 new employees next month.
questions.example: The company will take on 50 new employees next month.

questions.question: I need to ___ this problem with my manager.
questions.example: I need to bring up this problem with my manager.

questions.question: The fire ___ the entire forest.
questions.example: The fire burned down the entire forest.

questions.question: Can you ___ me at the airport tomorrow?
questions.example: Can you pick up me at the airport tomorrow?

questions.question: I ___ playing tennis when I was young.
questions.example: I took up playing tennis when I was young.

questions.question: The storm ___ many trees in the park.
questions.example: The storm knocked down many trees in the park.

questions.question: I need to ___ this application form.
questions.example: I need to fill out this application form.

questions.question: The concert was ___ due to bad weather.
questions.example: The concert was called off due to bad weather.

questions.question: She ___ her grandmother every Sunday.
questions.example: She calls on her grandmother every Sunday.

questions.question: I ___ my homework after dinner.
questions.example: I worked on my homework after dinner.

questions.question: The police are ___ the robbery case.
questions.example: The police are looking into the robbery case.

questions.question: I ___ my brother at the train station.
questions.example: I saw off my brother at the train station.

questions.question: The company ___ a new product line.
questions.example: The company brought out a new product line.

questions.question: I need to ___ these documents before the meeting.
questions.example: I need to go through these documents before the meeting.

questions.question: The price of gas ___ again this month.
questions.example: The price of gas went up again this month.

questions.question: I ___ my old clothes to charity.
questions.example: I gave away my old clothes to charity.

questions.question: The batteries in my phone ___ yesterday.
questions.example: The batteries in my phone ran down yesterday.

questions.question: I ___ my computer because it was frozen.
questions.example: I turned off my computer because it was frozen.

questions.question: The teacher ___ the exam papers to the students.
questions.example: The teacher handed out the exam papers to the students.

questions.question: I ___ my friend's lie immediately.
questions.example: I saw through my friend's lie immediately.

questions.question: The old factory was ___ to make room for apartments.
questions.example: The old factory was torn down to make room for apartments.
